title: Covid vaccine mandates in job listings jump by 34% as delta variant sparks surge in virus cases
content:
1. Covid vaccine mandates in job listings jump by 34% as delta variant sparks surge in virus cases  CNBC

  5. 'Breaking society apart': Unvaccinated people are angry as they face more Covid restrictions  CNBC

localize.title: Covidワクチンの求人票への記載が34％増加、deltaバリアントによるウイルス感染が急増
德尔塔变体引发病毒病例激增，招聘信息中的科维德疫苗任务量猛增34%。
德爾塔變體引發病毒病例激增，招聘信息中的科維德疫苗任務量猛增34%。
